comments.body: is there a reason you removed the emphasis here? I think it's useful for understanding the primary concern in each paragraph at a glance.
Any backwards incompatible change (which is the heading of the whole section) breaks code, so it seems quite unnecessary.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@   - `JAX <https://github.com/google/jax/issues/1565>`_ has been reluctant
     to implement ``__array_function__`` in part because it is concerned about
     breaking existing code: users expect NumPy functions like
     ``np.concatenate`` to return NumPy arrays. This is a fundamental
     limitation of the ``__array_function__`` design, which we chose to allow
